alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:06AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Marinette, Menominee, northern Oconto, southeastern Langlade and central Shawano Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 105 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gardner Dam Scout Camp to near Neopit to 9 miles east of Wittenberg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawano, Gillett, Crivitz, Mountain, Pound, White Lake, Big Smokey Falls, Bear Paw Scout Camp, Gardner Dam Scout Camp and Legend Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Menominee; Northern Oconto County; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
